p: Leaves were collected from wild-growing trees in north-central Vietnam. Plants were identified by Do Ngoc Dai and voucher specimens ( Table 1) have been deposited in the plant specimen room, Faculty Agriculture, Forestry and Fishery, Nghe An, College of Economics. In each case, the fresh leaves were chopped and 2.0 kg was subjected to hydrodistillation using a Clevenger-type apparatus.
